title: Roast venison loin with root vegetables and pickling sauce, venison meatballs
description: Venison, double marinated in spices, with sweet young root veg, spicy meatballs and a hot chilli sauce.
ingredients: 4 x 200g/7oz loin of venison steaks, trimmed and cleaned (reserve the trimmings)
corn or vegetable oil, for frying
500g/1lb 2oz young root vegetables (carrots, turnips, radishes, fennel bulbs), cleaned and trimmed
1 tsp panch phoran (Indian spice mix, available to buy ready-made, typically 1 part mustard seeds, 1 part black onion seeds, 1 part cumin seeds, ½ part fenugreek seeds, 2 parts fennel seeds)
